availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Madison Tilford (Scott County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Calvert Tilford. Father of Frances Tilford, Fannie Tilford, Andrew Tilford, and Annie Tilford. Tailor in Scott County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 474A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 950.
"George Madison Tilford (1819-1872)," Find A Grave, Memorial 59396634, accessed June 15, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59396634.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994054, Scott County Births, p. 925.
